column1: 8 pts - Identified business function is somewhat unlikely to benefit from scrum/sprint. Good effort in explaining the reasons, but the production function may not be the best fit for scrum/sprint. Keep exploring other business functions!
8 pts - Missing significant explanatory content. The response has some good points, but it lacks a clear and specific explanation of how scrum/sprint could operate for the chosen function.

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit

Comment: Good attempt in explaining why Kanban may not be the best fit for the production function. However, the explanation could be more specific and clear. Keep up the good work!

10 pts

Great job identifying the distribution function as a suitable area for implementing Kanban methodologies. Your explanation of how Kanban could benefit this function is well thought out and clear. Keep up the good work!

8 pts - Missing significant explanatory content. 

Your response has some good points, but it lacks a clear description of how Kanban could operate specifically for the distribution function. Please provide more details on the possible columns in the Kanban board and how it would help improve the process.

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good attempt, but try to focus more on explaining why scrum/sprint is a poor fit for the specific function.

5 pts - Selected bias is clearly relevant to this situation.

Great job identifying confirmation bias as a potential issue in Jackson's decision-making process. Your explanation and suggestions for addressing this bias are clear and helpful. Keep up the good work!

10/10

Great job defining confirmation bias and providing suggestions to avoid falling into its trap. Keep up the good work!
12 pts - Complete and clear description of possible problem. Great job on addressing the potential issues and providing solutions! Keep up the good work.
8 pts - Reasonable description, but missing some detail. Good effort in addressing the prompt, but some aspects could be more specific and detailed. Keep up the good work!
